name: Eternal Fury
description:
Fast paced topdown shooter. Only the first level is available, and I welcome any feedback. I'll be tweaking mechanics, so if you have ideas on how to evolve the game, let me know!

Controls

W, A, S, and D - Primary movement

Mouse - Aiming/Shooting

Space - Dodge

R - Reload

T - Switch Weapon

Esc - Pause/View map
